ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: I think it is okay if my child drinks alcohol on special occasions outside of the home.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I don't mind if my child drinks alcohol once in a while.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I disapprove of my child drinking alcohol under any circumstances.
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Do you allow my child to drink alcoholic beverages at family meals?
Do you allow my child to drink alcoholic beverages in your home with friends?
My mother/father thinks it is okay if I drink alcohol on special occasions outside the home (e.g., at a friend's party)
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father doesn't mind if I drink alcohol once in a while
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 4 = Somewhat agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: My mother/father disapproves of me drinking alcohol under any circumstances (reverse coded)
Notes: 5 = Strongly disagree; 4 = Somewhat disagree; 3 = Neither agree nor disagree; 2 = Somewhat agree; 1 = Strongly agree
